scripts.start: npm run view && npm run import:all && budo src/main.js:bundle.js -p 8080 --live --open -- -d -e src/main.js -t [babelify --comments false --presets es2015]
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run copy:all && npm run build:env
scripts.build:js: browserify -d -e src/main.js -t [babelify --comments false --presets es2015] | uglifyjs -cm > build/bundle.min.js
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:assets && npm run copy:phaser && npm run copy:settings && npm run copy:fonts && npm run copy:css
scripts.publish: npm run build && node build-scripts/publish.js && node build-scripts/remove-unused-img.js && node build-scripts/zip-files.js
scripts.import:all: npm run import:atlas && npm run import:levels
